actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to establish a national memorial to Franklin Delano Roosevelt, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Franklin D. Roosevelt Memorial Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to construct a national memorial to Franklin Delano Roosevelt on Franklin D. Roosevelt Island in the city and State of New York. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose. Repeals the reservation of a site for a Roosevelt Memorial in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to establish a national memorial to Franklin Delano Roosevelt, and for other purposes.
